Description: Bust of Leone Battista Alberti facing left, wearing close fitting dress. (obverse)
Laurel wreath within which is a winged human eye. (reverse)
Bibliographic references: Hill 1930 / A corpus of Italian medals of the Renaissance, 2 vols (p.39, 161c)
Exhibition history: 2022- 2023 13 Oct-19 Feb, London, BM, G30, Hieroglyphs: Unlocking Ancient Egypt
Associated names: Named in inscription & portrayed: Leon Battista Alberti
Acquisition name: Donated by: George IV, King of the United Kingdom
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: George III, King of the United Kingdom
